Reviews.Title: Ok phone....
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: It's a good phone but on my network which is net10 att network because of the phone im unable to receive picture mail and I been getting picture mail with my old phone so im disappointed. ..internet connection is also slow at times on this phone..I had to go through several apn settings to get it to work...the phone company stated because of the type of phone it doesn't guarantee picture mail and that sucks!! For $335 I expected to give this phone 5 stars

Reviews.Title: Network Reception
Reviews.Author: Lisa
Reviews.Content: This phone is great in size and image, however I had poor network issues after many times of APN attempts.

Reviews.Title: francais (france or suisse) options on mega GT-i9152
Reviews.Author: crystaz
Reviews.Content: if your mega did not come with a manual, I suggest you download one - it's freeon page 175, there are instructions on how to change the language and 2 versions of French you mentioned are available (do you need more options?)1) Settings2) My Device3) Language and Input (towards bottom of screen)4) Language5) Select your desired versionTHIS IS AN EXCELLENT PHONE - no qualms from me!  ;)

Reviews.Title: Put other language so could be usable for everybody.
Reviews.Author: K k
Reviews.Content: The product was november it didn't satisfied my expectation. I lost my money on it. I wish french language on it like majorities of the electronics have. When I sent this product to my country nobody want it and there is not anyway the set up the french language. I lost about $2000. Sorry I didn't like that part a all.
